#summary List of available keywords and how they compares to their PHP counterparts.

= Deleted Keywords =
|| *PHP*         || *Snow*       || * Comment * ||                                   
|| as            || _deleted_    || See "in". ||
|| break         || _deleted_    || See "overflow". ||
|| foreach       || _deleted_    || ||
|| var           || _deleted_    || ||

= Changed Keywords =
|| *PHP*         || *Snow*       || * Comment * ||
|| elseif        || elif         || "else if" is disabled. ||            
|| enddeclare    || end          || ||            
|| endfor        || end          || ||            
|| endforeach    || end          || ||             
|| endif         || end          || ||   
|| endswitch     || end          || ||             
|| endwhile      || end          || ||
|| array()       || `[]`         || ||
|| instanceof    || isa          || ||
|| function      || fn           || ||
|| continue      || next         || ||

= Shortened Access Modifier Keywords =
|| *PHP*         || *Snow*       || * Comment * ||
|| global        || glo          || ||
|| private       || pri          || ||
|| protected     || pro          || ||
|| public        || pub          || ||

= New keywords =
|| *Snow*       || * Comment * ||
|| when         || Postfix "if" sentence. ||
|| overflow     || Disable default "break" in "case" sentences. ||
|| in           || Used with the new "for" loop. ||

= Language constructs =
|| *PHP*          || *Snow*       || * Comment * ||
|| die()          || _deleted_    || Use "exit" instead. ||
|| echo()         || _unchanged_  || ||
|| empty()        || _unchanged_  || ||
|| exit()         || _unchanged_  || ||
|| eval()         || _deleted_    || Use "<?php ?>" injection instead. ||
|| include()      || _unchanged_  || ||
|| include_once() || _unchanged_  || ||
|| isset()        || _unchanged_  || ||
|| list()         || _unchanged_  || ||
|| require()      || _unchanged_  || ||
|| require_once() || _unchanged_  || ||
|| return()       || _unchanged_  || ||
|| print()        || _deleted_    || Use "echo" instead. ||
|| unset()        || _unchanged_  || ||

= Identifiers used inside a class =
Following identifiers may not be used as a class name as they have special purpose.
|| *PHP*  || *Snow*      || * Comment * ||
|| self   || _unchanged_ || ||
|| parent || _unchanged_ || ||
